Detailed Description

Herding Implementation of a herding goal. This goal mimics the herding behavior of pack animals (i.e. horse).

This method is called before each Update call to perform pre-processing. Does nothing for this goal.

Goal::PreUpdate

Reimplemented from Goal.

void Herding::Update ( f32  DeltaTime  )  [virtual]

This method is called each frame to update this goal. Updates herding targets and determines the best velocity to herd (Avoidance + Matching + Centering).

Parameters:
DeltaTime Elapsed time since the last frame.
See also:
Goal::Update

Reimplemented from Goal.

u32  NumTargets,
